name: Peggy ONeill
what_you_do: TAP FOR JOY is a phone app that helps reduce stress and increase happiness using a cutting-edge mind-technology called Eutaptics (Faster EFT tapping).
who_you_serve: The app is designed for anyone looking to reduce stress and improve their overall well-being.
social_proof: Peggy O'Neill is an award-winning speaker and author who has triumphed over many challenges. She has been featured on the cover of Speaker magazine.
signature_programs: TAP FOR JOY app, Happy Memory Journal, Tap For Joy 5-Day Challenge, Customized Intention Tapping Dialogues
business_focus: Providing a phone app and coaching to help people reduce stress and increase happiness.
